name: Gumbo Style Chicken Creole
author: SMFLRN
summary: Delicious chicken gumbo consistency with tomato base. Makes plenty to last for several days. Serve over hot cooked rice and sprinkle with filé powder, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, with liquid
3 dashes hot sauce, or to taste
½ cup chicken broth, or as needed  (Optional)
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat
Stir in flour and cook, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes or until mixture is the color of a copper penny
Reduce heat to low and stir in bell pepper and onion
Cook 10 to 15 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally
Add chicken, tomatoes with green chile peppers, mushrooms, parsley, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, soy sauce, sugar, salt, pepper and hot sauce
Stir together, cover and simmer for 20 minutes
Add chicken broth or water if mixture is too thick for your liking
